text: 156 is a whole number. It comes after 155 and before 157. == In mathematics == *156 is an even number. This means it can be divided by 2 without a remainder. *156 is a composite number, which means it has more factors than just 1 and itself. *Some factors of 156 are 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12, 13, 26, 39, 52, 78, and 156. == Other properties == *156 can be written as 12Ã—13. *In Roman numerals, 156 is written as CLVI. Category:Integers
title: 156 (number)
